nodes.text: This battle droid participated at the Battle of Kamino under command of General Grievous.

During the assault on Tipoca City, this B1-Series battle droid along with other battle droids and Aqua droids scoured the city for remaining clone troopers under command of general Grievous. This droid knocked on one of the doors inside the city to search for clones and after getting no response Grievous ordered him to open the door. When he shot open the door, a squad of clone troopers were waiting inside and destroyed him.
The B1 battle droid, like every battle droid in The Clone Wars movie and The Clone Wars TV series, was voiced by Matthew Wood. His name was never given.
